There are 30+ private homes on the island as well as a resort (Meridian Cay) that doubles as a clubhouse for the private homes.  Pine Cay presents an amazing contrast between primitive, undeveloped, unspoiled beach and luxurious private homes and resort that provide the best of both worlds to visitors and homeowners.  Pine Cay's most remarkable features include the island's natural beauty and the opportunity for complete solitude in a Caribbean paradise.  There are few permanent residents. Besides the homeowners, most residents are employees of the resort who do maintenance and provide services for the tourists.
Pine Cay is only accessible by boat or plane. There is a simple airstrip in the center of the island, only daylight traffic is allowed.
